member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.InnerSliceLabel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the inner slice label for the pie slice. The label can be straight text, or be comprised of text and formatting specifiers. The label should be specified as (note that brackets denote optional elements): "[text]{keyword[:format]}[text][{...}]".
Here are the formatting specifiers that can be used with both inner and outer labels:
"AVG" "A" - Average (angular values). "PCT" "P" - Percent of pie (angular values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOT" "T" - Total of all values (angluar values). "VAL" "V" - Value percent of pie (angular value) - (.025 yields ".025").
"AVGX" "AX" - Average (extent/radial values). "PCTX" "PX" - Percent of pie (extent values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOTX" "TX" - Total of all values (extent values). "VALX" "VX" - Value percent of pie (extent value) - (.025 yields ".025").
"S" "SNAME" - Series name. "X" - ValueX. "Y", "Y0", "Yn" - ValueY values (where 'n' is index value).
Example use:
"{S}\\n{X:yyyy} ({Y:##,##0} - {P:Y1})" "Individual cost {Y:C} and average cost {AVG:C} of goods."

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.MaxSlices
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum number of slices to represent in the pie. Any remaining values are consolidated into the 'Other' slice, if shown, or are not displayed at all.
The slices are counted in the order in which they are displayed. This order is affected by the ReverseSlices property.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.MinExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum extent for the collection.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.MinPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum percent-of-total represented in individual slices. Values less than the MinPercent are either accumulated into the 'Other' slice, if shown, or left in the main pie display. Range is 0–1.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.OtherSliceVisualStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets the default visual style for the series 'Other' slice.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.SliceVisualLayout.OuterSliceLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer slice label for the pie slice. See InnerSliceLabel for further notes on Format Specifiers.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of pie reference lines to display.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether references lines are displayed on top of chart data.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieSeriesPoint.InnerSliceLabel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the inner slice label for the pie slice. The label can be straight text, or be comprised of text and formatting specifiers. The label should be specified as "Some text {Keyword:Format} more text [{...:...}]".
Here are the formatting specifiers that can be used with both inner and outer labels:
"AVG" "A" - Average (angular values). "PCT" "P" - Percent of pie (angular values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOT" "T" - Total of all values (angluar values). "VAL" "V" - Value percent of pie (angular value) - (.025 yields ".025").
"AVGX" "AX" - Average (extent/radial values). "PCTX" "PX" - Percent of pie (extent values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOTX" "TX" - Total of all values (extent values). "VALX" "VX" - Value percent of pie (extent value) - (.025 yields ".025").
"S" "SNAME" - Series name. "X" - ValueX. "Y", "Y0", "Yn" - ValueY values (where 'n' is index value).
Examples:
"{S}\\n{X:yyyy} ({Y:##,##0} - {P:Y1})" "Individual cost {Y:C} and average cost {AVG:C} of goods."

"AVG" "A" - Average (angular values). "PCT" "P" - Percent of pie (angular values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOT" "T" - Total of all values (angluar values). "VAL" "V" - Value percent of pie (angular value) - (.025 yields ".025").
"AVGX" "AX" - Average (extent/radial values). "PCTX" "PX" - Percent of pie (extent values) - (.025 yields "2.5 %"). "TOTX" "TX" - Total of all values (extent values). "VALX" "VX" - Value percent of pie (extent value) - (.025 yields ".025").

member.summary: Gets or sets the custom palette for the chart.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.DetachedOffset
member.summary:
Gets or sets the default offset distance of a slice from the pie center, as measured by a percentage of the pie radius (if less than 1), or absolute pixel amount (if greater than 1). Default is .1.
A value of 0 will restore the slice to its original position in the pie (which may still be offset, if the pie is "exploded").

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.EffectiveChartStyle
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Chart's Effective (cached, composite) style.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.EffectivePieCenterStyle
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Chart's Effective (cached, composite) Pie Center styles.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.EnableCenterLabelMarkup
member.summary: Gets or sets whether text-markup support is enabled for the Center Label.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.EnableDragDetach
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can, by default, detach slices of the pie by Click and drag.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.EnableShiftDragExplode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can explode the pie by ShiftClick and drag.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ExplodedOffset
member.summary:
Gets or sets the offset of each slice from the pie center when the pie is Exploded. The offset is is measured as a percentage of the pie radius (if less than 1) or the absolute pixel amount (if greater than 1). Default is .1.
Clicking a Detached slice will restore it to its original position in the pie, which may still be offset by this amount, if the pie is 'exploded'.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.GridInnerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the Inner radius of the pie grid, relative to the pie area. Can be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1). Defaults to 0.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.GridOuterRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer radius of the pie grid, relative to the pie area. Can be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1). Defaults to 1 (ie 100 %).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.GridInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the radial grid interval (interval division between grid lines).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.GridMaxValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the radial grid maximum value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.GridMinValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the radial grid minimum value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.InnerMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner pixel margin between the inner most ring and the pie center. Default is .02d.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.InnerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the inner radius for the pie, relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1). A value > 0 will create an inner "hole" or donut chart.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.IsExploded
member.summary: Gets or sets whether all slices of the pie have been pulled out, or exploded, from the center of the pie. This attribute can be used to create added emphasis or to highlight the entire pie. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MaxDetachedOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum Detached Offset value (in pixels) that a pie slice can be detached. Default is 100.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MaxExplodedOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum ExplodedOffset value (in pixels) that the pie may be exploded. Default is 100.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MaxRingOutRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum radius of the Center RingOut image (in pixels). Default is 48.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MinOuterRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum outer radius of the chart, in pixels. Defaults to 80.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MinRingOutRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum radius of the Center RingOut image (in pixels). Default is 9.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MouseClickSliceAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the default action used when the user clicks on a pie slice. Default is 'None'.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MouseDoubleClickSliceAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the default action used when the user double-clicks on a pie slice. Default is 'None'.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.MultiSelect
member.summary: Gets or sets whether multiple items can be selected by the user. Default is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.OuterMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer pixel margin for the chart.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.OuterRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer radius of the pie, relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1). Defaults to .8 (ie 80 %).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.PaletteGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets the palette color group to use (Light/Medium/Dark/Color1/MonoBlue/etc).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.PieRadiusScale
member.summary: Gets or sets how the PieRadius values (InnerRadius, OuterRadius, GridInnerRadius, and GridOuterRadius) are interpreted (as absolute pixel values or as relative percentages).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.PieRingOutDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the display mode for the RingOut indicator (used to move out a ring level when ShowAllRings is false and the ActiveSeriesPointCollection has been set to an inner ring).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.PieSelectionMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default mode used to perform pie selections. Default is 'Slice'.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ReversePaletteColors
member.summary: Gets or sets whether default palette colors are utilized in reverse order.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ReverseRingOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets whether rings of the pie are presented in reverse order.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.SeriesMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the margin between multiple series in the chart, relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1). Defaults to .02

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.SeriesOverlayEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether chart series are, by default, overlayed on top of each other. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowAllRings
member.summary: Gets or sets whether all series rings are shown when rendering the chart. If false, only one ring at a time is shown, with the ability to 'drill' up or down, to display adjacent rings. Defaults to true'.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowFullGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the radial pie grid is displayed over the entire pie (0 - 360 degrees) or only over the sweep angle. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowGridOnTop
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the radial grid is displayed on top of the pie (ShowPieGrid must also be true). Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowOtherSlice
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to consolidate 'excluded' pie slices (due to MaxSlices or MinPercent settings) into a single slice that represents 'Other' data values. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowPieGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a radial grid is displayed for the chart. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowSliceLabelsOnEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets whether all enabled slice labels will be shown when the mouse enters the chart area. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Gets or sets whether tooltips are shown.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.SliceLabelOverlapMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode for resolving overlapping outer slice labels. Outer slice labels are only displayed for the outer-most chart series ring. This setting only applies to individual series (ie. Overlapped series are treated as distinct elements). Default is HideOverlapping.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.PieChart.SubSliceVisualLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the default layout of chart SeriesPoints that are subordinate to the chart.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart utilizes the alternate background color when ShowPieGrid is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the behavior when the user clicks the mouse in the chart whitespace.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode used to render "Step Lines" in a given Line series.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode.NotSet
member.summary: Not set (default is HorizontalThenVertical).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode.None
member.summary: No Step Lines will be rendered.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode.HorizontalThenVertical
member.summary: Step lines will be displayed between consecutive series points, by first displaying the horizontal step line, followed by the connecting vertical step line.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode.VerticalThenHorizontal
member.summary: Step lines will be displayed between consecutive series points, by first displaying the vertical step line, followed by the connecting horizontal step line.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLineMode.MidPoint
member.summary: Step lines will be displayed between consecutive series points, by first displaying the midPoint horizontal step line, followed by the connecting vertical step line.

member.summary: Specifies the mode used to render "Stepped Lines" in a given Line series.

member.summary: No step lines will be displayed.

member.summary: Horizontal step lines will be displayed.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLines.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical step lines will be displayed.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.StepLines.Both
member.summary: Both horizontal and vertical step lines will be displayed.

member.summary: ScaleType is NotSet (default is 'Auto').

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ScaleType.Auto
member.summary: ScaleType is Automatic. Scale type will be determined by the underlying, assigned data.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ScaleType.DateTime
member.summary: DateTime data scale. Points will be treated as DateTime values and will be shown as such on the axis.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ScaleType.Quantitative
member.summary: Numerical data scale. Points will be treated as numerical values and will be shown on the axis as numbers.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ScaleType.Qualitative
member.summary: Qualitative data scale. Points will be treated as qualitative values and will be shown on the axis as text.

member.summary: Box Plot display. Display is identical to 'Candle' except: 1. Median separated segments are separately rendered using both default and alternate box backgrounds. 2. UseAlternateSegmentStyle defaults to false.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.HiLoBarType.Candle
member.summary: Candle Plot display. Display is identical to 'Box' except: 1. Mmedian separated segments are both rendered using either the default or alternate box background. 2. UseAlternateSegmentStyle defaults to true.

members.member: Represents an X/Y oriented chart. pi

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.AncillaryAxesX
member.summary: Gets a reference to the collection of Ancillary X Axes (Axes that can be presented in addition to the default X Axis)

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.AncillaryAxesY
member.summary: Gets a reference to the collection of Ancillary Y Axes (Axes that can be presented in addition to the default Y Axis)

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.AutoGenSeriesType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default SeriesType assigned to auto-generated Series.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.AxisX
member.summary: Gets a reference to the default, primary X Axis.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.AxisY
member.summary: Gets a reference to the default, primary Y Axis.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarFillRange
member.summary: Gets or sets how series bars are filled by default (either according to each individual bar range, or the entire series range).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarLabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the default position of bar series labels (default is Center).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarOrigin
member.summary: Gets or sets the bar 'origin'. This value is used as the base, or starting Value, from which each bar originates.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarOverlayEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the intra-bar (or bar grouping) overlay is enabled (bars within a group are positoned overlayed on top of each other).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarShadingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Bar shading is enabled by default for Horizontal and Vertical Bar series.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarShowAsHistogram
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the bars will be shown as a Histogram. Note that this will only be honored for single series bar displays.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the intra-bar spacing (or spacing between bars within the same group). Value is taken as a fixed pixel size. Setting BarSpacing to 0 (zero) will disable the use of this property, and will enable the use of the set BarSpacingRatio value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarSpacingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the intra-bar spacing ratio (bar spacing between multiple series bars associated with the same value. Default is .2).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BarWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the default ratio of bar width to bar group spacing (defaults to 1 - bar width matches spacing).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BubbleIntensityMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default mode used to determine series bubble intensities.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.BubbleSizeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default mode used to calculate series bubble sizes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartLineAreaDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Line 'Area' display mode.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartLineDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default display mode for SeriesType.Line series.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartSeries
member.summary: Gets a reference to the collection of Chart Series

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartSeriesVisualStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the default visual style for each chart series.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartVisualStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the Chart.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ChartCrosshair
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Crosshair element for the chart.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.ConvexHullDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default ConvexHull display mode.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.DataLabelOverlapMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode for resolving overlapping series data labels.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartXy.DataLabelVisualStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the default visual style for the chart DataLabel's.

member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the slice border.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether shading is applie to the pie slice.

member.summary: Gets or sets the slice Image.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageAngleOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the display angle offset for the slice image. By default, the image is centered in the pie slice (mid sweepAngle), but can be offset either toward the end angle (positive offset) or toward the start angle (negative offset). The offset can either be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageAutoRotate
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Image (or Symbol) is auto rotated to match the angle of the slice.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageCropMode
member.summary: Gets or sets how the slice image will be displayed when the image needs to be cropped due to 'angular' size constraints (ie. will not fully fit within the slice angular bounds). Default is ClipImage.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the slice image index (used with the ImageList property).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageInnerRadiusAnchor
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner radius anchor for the slice image (ie. the inner limiting radius - used with the ImageRadiusOffset property).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageList
member.summary: Gets or sets the slice ImageList.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageOuterRadiusAnchor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Outer radius anchor for the slice image (ie. the Outer limiting radius - used with the ImageRadiusOffset percentage).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageOverlay
member.summary: Gets or sets how to overlay the image with respect to the slice text.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImagePadding
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between content and edges of the Image

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ShouldSerializeImagePadding
member.summary: Gets whether property should be serialized.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ResetImagePadding
member.summary: Resets property to its default value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageRadiusOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the display radius for the slice image. The image can be offset toward the outer radius (positive offset) or toward the inner radius (negative offset). The offset can either be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount to rotate the image, specified in degrees.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ImageScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'scale' factor for the image/symbol. This property informs the chart to scale the image (or symbol) based upon the available space at its offset position in the slice - the image is moved in or out of the slice, the image will grow of shrink accordingly.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ExtentAverageRefLineStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the slice Extent Average ReferenceLine style (see SliceVisualLayout.ReferenceLineDisplayMode).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ExtentMaxRefLineStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the slice Extent Maximum ReferenceLine style (see SliceVisualLayout.ReferenceLineDisplayMode).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ExtentMinRefLineStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the slice Extent Minimum ReferenceLine style (see SliceVisualLayout.ReferenceLineDisplayMode).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.ExtentOuterRefLineStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the slice Extent Outer ReferenceLine style (see SliceVisualLayout.ReferenceLineDisplayMode).

member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the inner slice Label.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.ChartSliceVisualStyle.SliceOuterLabelStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual style for the outer slice Label.

member.summary: Gets or sets the element Symbol Definition. Note that Symbol definition takes precedence over Image definition. Also note that the supporting Image properties (such as ImageCrpoMode, ImageRadiusOffset, etc) apply to a set Symbol as well as to a set Image.

member.summary: Defines the visibility of the CenterLabel

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.CenterLabelVisibility.Always
member.summary: Always shown.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.CenterLabelVisibility.Never
member.summary: Never showm.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.CenterLabelVisibility.MouseOver
member.summary: Only shown on MouseOver.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelCropMode
member.summary: Defines the label crop/clip mode.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelCropMode.NotSet
member.summary: NotSet

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelCropMode.NoAction
member.summary: No clipping or hiding performed.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelCropMode.Clip
member.summary: Labels that do not fully fit will be clipped.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelCropMode.Hide
member.summary: Labels that do not fully fit will be hidden.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode
member.summary: Defines the slice label display mode.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.NotSet
member.summary: NotSet

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.None
member.summary: No labels displayed.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.Inner
member.summary: Inner labels only displayed (those inside the pie slice).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.Outer
member.summary: Outer labels only displayed (those outside the pie slice).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.InnerAndOuter
member.summary: Both inner and outer labels displayed.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelDisplayMode.InnerXorOuter
member.summary: Either the inner or the outer label will be displayed, but not both (outer label will be displayed only when the inner label cannot be displayed).

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation
member.summary: Defines the slice inner label orientation.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.NotSet
member.summary: NotSet

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.Adaptive
member.summary: The text is perpendicular to the center line of the slice, and is 'adapted' to fit the outer arc of the slice.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.Custom
member.summary: The label layout is gotten from the set 'Custom' layout properties for the slice (include location, size, orientation, etc). This option give the most control over the presentation of the label.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Labels are presented horizontally, within the bounds of the slice.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.Parallel
member.summary: Labels are presented parallel to the slice center line, within the bounds of the slice.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelOrientation.Perpendicular
member.summary: Labels are presented perpendicular to the slice center line, within the bounds of the slice.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility
member.summary: Defines the visibility of the slice labels. These values can be combined to define a more targeted visibility.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.NotSet
member.summary: NotSet

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.Always
member.summary: Labels are always visible.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.Never
member.summary: Labels are never visible.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.SelectionModeMouseOver
member.summary: Labels will be shown according to the SelectionMode setting in effect (ie. Ring, Slice, Pie, etc).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.SliceDetach
member.summary: Labels are shown for Detached slices.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.SliceMouseOver
member.summary: Labels are shown on MouseOver.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceLabelVisibility.SliceSelect
member.summary: Labels are shown for selected slices.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle
member.summary: Represents the visual style of a series Slice.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.AngleMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the margin (in degrees) to inset the label from both the start and ending slice angles.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.AutoOrientLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the label will be auto oriented away from being upside down.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.AutoRotate
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the label is auto rotated to match the angle of the slice (only valid for 'Custom' orientation mode).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CustomAngleOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the display angle offset for the label when the label orientation is set to 'Custom'. The label can be offset toward the end angle (positive offset) or toward the start angle (negative offset). The offset is either a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CustomFontAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom font angle when the label orientation is set to 'Custom'. The FontAngle is the additional number of degrees the label will be rotated.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CustomHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the bounding rectangle for the label when the label orientation is set to 'Custom'. The height can be a percentage of the slice height (if the value is between 0 and 1), or an absolute pixel amount (if the value is > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CustomRadiusOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the display radius offset for the label when the label orientation is set to 'Custom. The label can be offset toward the outer radius (positive offset) or toward the inner radius (negative offset). The offset can either be a percentage (if value is between 0 and 1) or pixel amount (if value > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CustomWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom width for the bounding rectangle of the label when the label orientation is set to 'Custom'. The width can be a percentage of the slice width at the set RadiusOffset (if the value is between 0 and 1), or an absolute pixel amount (if the value is > 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.InnerRadiusOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the inner edge of the rectangular label area from the outer slice radius, as measured by a percentage of the slice radius (if less than 1), or absolute pixel amount (if greater than 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.OuterRadiusOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the outer edge of the rectangular label area from the outer slice radius, as measured by a percentage of the slice radius (if less than 1), or absolute pixel amount (if greater than 1).

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.OuterRadiusOffsetBase
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the label's OuterRadiusOffset is relative to the slice OuterRadius or the slice ExtentRadius.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets whether the style is logically Empty.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.ApplyStyle(DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle)
member.summary: Applies the style to instance of this style.

member.summary: Returns the copy of the style.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle.CopyTo(DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceInnerLabelVisualStyle)
member.summary: Returns the copy of the style.

member.summary: Dispose

member.summary: Gets or sets whether a connecting line is drawn from the slice to the outer slice label.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceOuterLabelVisualStyle.LabelMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the pixel margin between the outer label and the chart outer radius, as well as between the label and any adjacent slice labels.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.SliceOuterLabelVisualStyle.MaxLabelHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum vertical size of the label, as measured by a percentage of the chart height (if less than 1), or absolute pixel amount (if greater than 1).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.LightDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points and are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.ForwardDiagonal, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.LightUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points and are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.BackwardDiagonal, but they are not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DarkDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than, and are twice the width of System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.ForwardDiagonal. This hatch pattern is not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DarkUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.BackwardDiagonal, and are twice its width, but the lines are not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.WideDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.ForwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.WideUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.BackwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.LightVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Vertical.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.LightHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Horizontal.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.NarrowVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Vertical (or 25 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.LightVertical).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.NarrowHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Horizontal (or 25 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.LightHorizontal).

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DarkVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Vertical and are twice its width.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DarkHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Horizontal and are twice the width of System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.Horizontal.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DashedDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines, that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DashedUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines, that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DashedHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies dashed horizontal lines.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DashedVertical
member.summary: Specifies dashed vertical lines.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.SmallConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.LargeConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti, and is composed of larger pieces than System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle.SmallConfetti.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.ZigZag
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of zigzags.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Wave
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of tildes.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DiagonalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of layered bricks that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.HorizontalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of horizontally layered bricks.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Weave
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a woven material.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Plaid
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a plaid material.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Divot
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of divots.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DottedGrid
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines, each of which is composed of dots, that cross.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.DottedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines, each of which is composed of dots, that cross.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Shingle
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of diagonally layered shingles that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Trellis
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a trellis.

member.name: F:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.Style.HatchFillType.Sphere

member.summary: MeasureText always adds about 1/2 em width of white space on the right, even when NoPadding is specified. It returns zero for an empty string. To get the precise string width, measure the width of a string containing a single period and subtract that from the width of our original string plus a period.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartControl.BeginUpdate
member.summary:
Calling the BeginUpdate routine informs the Chart Control that an extended update phase has begun. The Chart Control will suspend all layout calculations and display updates until the corresponding EndUpdate routine is called.
BeginUpdate / EndUpdate can be nested and must be called in pairs – every BeginUpdate must have a matching EndUpdate call.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Charts.ChartControl.EndUpdate
member.summary:
Calling the EndUpdate routine informs the Chart Control that an extended update phase has ended.
BeginUpdate / EndUpdate can be nested and must be called in pairs – every EndUpdate must have a matching BeginUpdate call.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are forced to fit the container bounds if they occupy more space than it is available by container. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.Charts.TextMarkup.SerialContentLayoutManager.FitContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized to fit the container bound if they occupy less space than it is available by container. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.Charts.TextMarkup.SerialContentLayoutManager.VerticalFitContainerWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized (Width) to fit container bounds if they occupy less space than the actual container width. Applies to the Vertical orientation only. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.Charts.TextMarkup.SerialContentLayoutManager.HorizontalFitContainerHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized (Height) to fit container bounds if they occupy less space than the actual container height. Applies to the Horizontal orientation only. Default value is false.
